<!-- XBRL,NS -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<B>
	SCHEDULE I&#151;CONDENSED FINANCIAL INFORMATION OF THE PARENT
<BR>
	NACCO INDUSTRIES, INC. AND SUBSIDIARIES
<BR>
	NOTES TO PARENT COMPANY CONDENSED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
<BR>
	FOR THE YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2009, 2008 AND 2007
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	The notes to Consolidated Financial Statements, incorporated in Item&nbsp;15 of this Form 10-K, are
	hereby incorporated by reference into these Notes to Parent Company Condensed Financial Statements.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT">
<B>
	NOTE A &#151; LONG-TERM OBLIGATIONS AND GUARANTEES
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	NACCO Industries, Inc. (the parent company or &#147;NACCO&#148;) is a holding company that has five operating
	segments. It is NACCO&#146;s policy not to guarantee the debt of its subsidiaries, which make up these
	segments.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT">
<B>
	NOTE B &#151; UNRESTRICTED CASH
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	The amount of unrestricted cash available to NACCO, included in &#147;Investment in subsidiaries&#148; was
	$8.6&nbsp;million at December&nbsp;31, 2009 and was in addition to the $48.8&nbsp;million of cash included in the
	Parent Company Condensed Balance Sheets at December&nbsp;31, 2009.
</DIV>
<!-- /XBRL,NS -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<!-- FOLIO -->
	F-55
<!-- /FOLIO -->
</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->

<TD WIDTH="96">

<TD NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">

	(A)

	&nbsp;

<TD>
	Write-offs, net of recoveries.

<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>

	(B)

	Payments and customer deductions for product returns, discounts and allowances.

	&nbsp;

</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	(D)
</SUP>
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Includes allowance of receivables classified as long-term of $12.0&nbsp;million, $6.2
	million and $4.6&nbsp;million in 2009, 2008 and 2007, respectively.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 3PT">
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	(E)
</SUP>
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Balances which are not required to be presented and those which are immaterial have
	been omitted.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<!-- FOLIO -->
	F-56
<!-- /FOLIO -->
</DIV>

	Commission the instruments defining the rights of holders of long-term debt of the Company and
	its subsidiaries where the total amount of securities authorized thereunder does not exceed
	10% of the total assets of the Company and its subsidiaries on a consolidated basis.

	Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to the Hamilton Beach Brands, Inc. Unfunded Benefit Plan (As Amended and
	Restated Effective as of December&nbsp;1, 2007) is attached hereto as Exhibit&nbsp;10.118.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>

<A NAME="eolPage155"></A>
<A NAME="L38668EXV10W24_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10"></A>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT">
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;10.24
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 2
<BR>
	TO THE RETIREMENT BENEFIT PLAN
<BR>
	FOR ALFRED M. RANKIN, JR.
<BR>
	(
</B>
<U>
<B>
	As Amended and Restated as of December&nbsp;1, 2007
</B>
</U>
<B>
	)
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NACCO Industries, Inc. hereby adopts this Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to the Retirement Benefit Plan for
	Alfred M. Rankin, Jr. (As Amended and Restated as of December&nbsp;1, 2007) (the &#147;Plan&#148;), to be
	effective January&nbsp;1, 2010. Words used herein with initial capital letters which are defined in the
	Plan are used herein as so defined.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;2.1(14) of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.1(14)
</U>
	ROTCE shall mean the consolidated return on total capital employed
	of the Employer as determined by the Employer for a particular Plan Year.&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;2
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;2.1(15) of the Plan is hereby deleted in its entirety without renumbering the
	remaining provisions of Article&nbsp;II.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;4.1(b) of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	&#147;(b) Earnings Applicable to Covered Employees
</U>
	. For periods on and after January&nbsp;1,
	2010, at the end of each calendar month during a Plan Year, the Account of the Participant shall be
	credited with an amount determined by multiplying such Participant&#146;s weighted average daily Account
	balance during such month by 5%. Notwithstanding the foregoing:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	No earnings shall be credited for the month in which the
	Participant receives the distribution of his Account.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	In the event that the ROTCE determined for such Plan Year
	exceeds 5%, the Account shall retroactively be credited with the excess (if
	any) of (i)&nbsp;the amount determined by multiplying the average balance of such
	Account during each month of such Plan Year by the ROTCE determined for such
	Plan Year, compounded monthly over (ii)&nbsp;5%. In the event of a Participant&#146;s
	Termination of Employment during a Plan Year, the ROTCE calculation shall be
	made as of the last day of the month immediately preceding the date of the
	Participant&#146;s Termination of Employment during a Plan Year, and shall be based
	on the year-to-date ROTCE for the month ending prior to the date the
	Participant incurred a Termination of Employment, as calculated by the
	Employer. For any subsequent month following such Termination, such ROTCE
	calculation shall not apply.&#148;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;EXECUTED this 10
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	day of November, 2009.
</DIV>
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="35%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="15%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="3" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	NACCO INDUSTRIES, INC.
</B>
<BR>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
	By:&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="2" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: 1PX SOLID #000000" ALIGN="LEFT">
	/s/ Charles A. Bittenbender
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="2" ALIGN="LEFT">
	Title: Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>

<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 1
<BR>
	TO THE NACCO INDUSTRIES, INC.
<BR>
	EXCESS RETIREMENT PLAN
<BR>
	(
</B>
<U>
<B>
	Effective January&nbsp;1, 2008
</B>
</U>
<B>
	)
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NACCO Industries, Inc. hereby adopts this Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to the NACCO Industries, Inc. Excess
	Retirement Plan (Effective January&nbsp;1, 2008) (the &#147;Plan&#148;), to be effective as of the close of
	business on December&nbsp;31, 2009. Words used herein with initial capital letters which are defined in
	the Plan are used herein as so defined.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;3.4 of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;The Participant described in Section&nbsp;2.10(c) of the Plan shall have credited to his
	Transitional Sub-Account an amount (the &#147;Transitional Benefits&#148;) equal to (a) $60,433 on December
	31, 2008 and (b) $62,850 on December&nbsp;31, 2009 and each following December&nbsp;31
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	; provided
	that the Participant is employed by the Company on such date(s).&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	EXECUTED this 13
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	day of November, 2009.

<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_3"></A>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT">
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;10.26
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 2
<BR>
	TO THE NACCO INDUSTRIES, INC.
<BR>
	UNFUNDED BENEFIT PLAN
<BR>
	(
</B>
<U>
<B>
	As Amended and Restated Effective as of December&nbsp;1, 2007
</B>
</U>
<B>
	)
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NACCO Industries, Inc. hereby adopts this Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to the NACCO Industries, Inc.
	Unfunded Benefit Plan (As Amended and Restated Effective as of December&nbsp;1, 2007) (the &#147;Plan&#148;), to
	be effective January&nbsp;1, 2010. Words used herein with initial capital letters which are defined in
	the Plan are used herein as so defined.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;2.10 of the Plan is hereby deleted in its entirety, without renumbering the remaining
	provisions of Article&nbsp;II.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;2
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;2.20 of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.20
</U>
	ROTCE shall mean the consolidated return on total capital employed of
	the Company as determined by the Company for a particular Plan Year.&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;2.21 of the Plan is hereby deleted in its entirety without renumbering the remaining
	provisions of Article&nbsp;II.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;4
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;5.03(b) of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	&#147;(b) Earnings Applicable to Covered Employees
</U>
	. Except as otherwise described in the
	Plan, for periods on and after January&nbsp;1, 2010, at the end of each calendar month during a Plan
	Year, all Sub-Accounts of the Covered Employees shall be credited with an amount determined by
	multiplying such Participant&#146;s average Sub-Account balance during such month by 5%.
	Notwithstanding the foregoing:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	No earnings shall be credited for the month in which the Participant
	receives the distribution of the principle amount of his Sub-Accounts.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	In the event that the ROTCE determined for such Plan Year exceeds 5%,
	the Basic Excess 401(k) Sub-Account and Excess Matching Sub-Account shall
	retroactively be credited with the excess (if any) of (i)&nbsp;the amount determined by
	multiplying the Participant&#146;s average Sub-Account balance during each month of
	such Plan Year by the ROTCE determined for such Plan Year, compounded monthly over
	(ii)&nbsp;5%. In the event of a Participant&#146;s Termination of Employment during a Plan
	Year, the ROTCE calculation shall be made during the month in which the
	Participant incurs a Termination of Employment and shall be based on the
	year-to-date ROTCE for the month ending prior to the date the Participant incurred
	a Termination of Employment, as calculated by the Company. For any subsequent
	month following such Termination, such ROTCE calculation shall not apply.&#148;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	EXECUTED this 10
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	day of November, 2009.
</DIV>
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;
</TD>

	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;
</TD>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="15%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN="3" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	NACCO INDUSTRIES, INC.
</B>
<BR>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
	By:&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>

	&nbsp;
</TD>

<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT">
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;10.41
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 1
<BR>
	TO THE NORTH AMERICAN COAL CORPORATION
<BR>
	SUPPLEMENTAL RETIREMENT BENEFIT PLAN
<BR>
	(
</B>
<U>
<B>
	As Amended and Restated as of January&nbsp;1, 2008
</B>
</U>
<B>
	)
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The North American Coal Corporation hereby adopts this Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to The North American
	Coal Corporation Supplemental Retirement Benefit Plan (As Amended and Restated as of January&nbsp;1,
	2008) (the &#147;Plan&#148;), to be effective as of the close of business on December&nbsp;31, 2009. Words used
	herein with initial capital letters which are defined in the Plan are used herein as so defined.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The &#147;Whereas&#148; clauses to the Introduction to the Plan are hereby amended by adding the
	following 10
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	paragraph to the end thereof, to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 2%">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;WHEREAS, effective December&nbsp;31, 2009, the COLAs provided to Plan 006 Participants were
	permanently frozen.&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;2
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Sections&nbsp;3.3(1) and 3.3(3) of the Plan are each hereby amended by adding the following new
	sentence to the end thereof, to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&#147;Notwithstanding the foregoing or any other provision of the Plan to the contrary, the Supplemental
	Retirement Benefits of all Plan 006 Participants are permanently frozen effective as of the close
	of business on December&nbsp;31, 2009.&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Exhibit&nbsp;A to the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as shown in the attachment to
	this Amendment.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	EXECUTED this 6
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	day of October, 2009.
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage159"></A>
<A NAME="L38668EXV10W42_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_5"></A>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT">
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;10.42
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 2
<BR>
	TO THE NORTH AMERICAN COAL CORPORATION
<BR>
	DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN FOR MANAGEMENT EMPLOYEES
<BR>
	(
</B>
<U>
<B>
	As Amended and Restated as of December&nbsp;1, 2007
</B>
</U>
<B>
	)
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The North American Coal Corporation hereby adopts this Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to The North American
	Coal Corporation Deferred Compensation Plan for Management Employees (As Amended and Restated as of
	December&nbsp;1, 2007) (the &#147;Plan&#148;), to be effective January&nbsp;1, 2010. Words used herein with initial
	capital letters which are defined in the Plan are used herein as so defined.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;2.12 of the Plan is hereby deleted in its entirety without renumbering the remaining
	provisions of Article&nbsp;II.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;2
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;2.19 of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.19
</U>
	ROTCE shall mean the consolidated return on total capital employed of
	NACCO as determined by NACCO for a particular Plan Year.&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;2.20 of the Plan is hereby deleted in its entirety without renumbering the remaining
	provisions of Article&nbsp;II.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;4
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;4.02(b) of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	&#147;(b) Earnings Applicable to Covered Employees
</U>
	. Except as otherwise described in the
	Plan, for periods on and after January&nbsp;1, 2010, at the end of each calendar month during a Plan
	Year, all Sub-Accounts of the Covered Employees shall be credited with an amount determined by
	multiplying such Participant&#146;s average Sub-Account balance during such month by 5%.
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, in the event that the ROTCE determined for such Plan Year exceeds
	the rate credited under the preceding sentence to the Excess Profit Sharing Sub-Account, Basic
	Excess 401(k) Sub-Account and Basic Excess Matching Sub-Account, such Sub-Accounts shall
	retroactively be credited with the excess (if any) of (i)&nbsp;the amount determined under the preceding
	sentence over (ii)&nbsp;the amount determined by multiplying the Participant&#146;s average Sub-Account
	balance during each month of such Plan Year by the ROTCE determined for such Plan Year, compounded
	monthly. This ROTCE calculation shall be made during the month in which the Participant incurs a
	Termination of Employment and shall be based on the year-to-date ROTCE for the month ending prior
	to the date the Participant incurred a Termination of Employment, as calculated by NACCO. For any
	subsequent month following such Termination, such ROTCE calculation shall not apply.&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	EXECUTED this 10
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	day of November, 2009.
</DIV>

</B>
<BR>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>

</TD>
</TR>

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage160"></A>
<A NAME="L38668EXV10W86_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_6"></A>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT">
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;10.86
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 1
<BR>
	TO THE NACCO MATERIALS HANDLING GROUP, INC.
<BR>
	UNFUNDED BENEFIT PLAN
<BR>
	(
</B>
<U>
<B>
	As Amended and Restated Effective April&nbsp;24, 2009
</B>
</U>
<B>
	)
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NACCO Materials Handling Group, Inc. hereby adopts this Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to the NACCO Materials
	Handling Group, Inc. Unfunded Benefit Plan (As Amended and Restated Effective April&nbsp;24, 2009) (the
	&#147;Plan&#148;), to be effective January&nbsp;1, 2010. Words used herein with initial capital letters which are
	defined in the Plan are used herein as so defined.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;2.15 of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.19.
</U>
	ROTCE shall mean the consolidated return on total capital employed of
	NACCO as determined by NACCO for a particular Plan Year.&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;2
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;5.1(a) of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	&#147;(a) In General
</U>
	. Except as otherwise described in the Plan, for periods on and after
	January&nbsp;1, 2010, at the end of each calendar month during a Plan Year through the end of the month
	prior to the payment date, the Accounts of the Covered Employees shall be credited with an amount
	determined by multiplying such Participant&#146;s average Sub-Account balance during such month by 5%.
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, in the event that the ROTCE determined for such Plan Year exceeds
	the rate credited under the preceding sentence to the Excess Profit Sharing Sub-Account, Basic
	Excess Deferral Sub-Account, Basic Excess 401(k) Sub-Account and Basic Excess Matching Sub-Account,
	such Sub-Accounts shall retroactively be credited with the excess (if any) of (i)&nbsp;the amount
	determined under the preceding sentence over (ii)&nbsp;the amount determined by multiplying the
	Participant&#146;s Sub-Account balance during each month of such Plan Year by the ROTCE determined for
	such Plan Year, compounded monthly. This ROTCE calculation shall be made during the month in which
	the Participant incurs a Termination of Employment and shall be based on the year-to-date ROTCE for
	the month ending prior to the date the Participant incurred a Termination of Employment, as
	calculated by NACCO. For any subsequent month following such Termination, such ROTCE calculation
	shall not apply.&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	EXECUTED this 10
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	day of November, 2009.
</DIV>
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="35%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="15%">
	&nbsp;

</TR>

<A NAME="eolPage161"></A>
<A NAME="L38668EXV10W87_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_7"></A>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT">
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;10.87
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 1
<BR>
	TO THE
<BR>
	NACCO MATERIALS HANDLING GROUP, INC.
<BR>
	LONG-TERM INCENTIVE COMPENSATION PLAN
<BR>
	(EFFECTIVE JANUARY 1, 2008)
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NACCO Materials Handling Group, Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;), hereby adopts this Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to
	the NACCO Materials Handling Group, Inc. Long-Term Incentive Compensation Plan (Effective January
	1, 2008) (the &#147;Plan&#148;), effective January&nbsp;1, 2010. Words and phrases used herein with initial
	capital letters that are defined in the Plan are used herein as so defined.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;4(j) of the Plan is hereby deleted in its entirety without renumbering the remaining
	Subsections of Section&nbsp;4 of the Plan.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;2
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;4(s) of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;(s) &#147;ROTCE&#148; shall mean the return on total capital employed of the Company, as determined
	for a particular Plan Year.&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;10(b) of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;(b)
<U>
	Interest
</U>
	. The Participant&#146;s Sub-Accounts shall be credited with interest as
	follows; provided, however, that (1)&nbsp;no interest shall be credited to a Sub-Account after the
	Maturity Date of the Sub-Account, (2)&nbsp;no interest shall be credited to a Sub-Account following a
	Participant&#146;s Termination of Employment prior to a Maturity Date (except as described in Section
	10(c)(ii) with respect to delayed payments made to Key Employees on account of a Termination of
	Employment), (3)&nbsp;no interest shall be credited to the Sub-Accounts after the last day of the month
	preceding the payment date of such Sub-Account and (4)&nbsp;no interest in excess of 14% shall be
	credited to any Sub-Account.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="2%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<U>
	(i)
</U>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<U>
	Interest Rate
</U>
	. At the end of each calendar month during a calendar year,
	the Sub-Accounts of Participants shall be credited with an amount determined by
	multiplying the Participant&#146;s Sub-Account balances during such month by 5%. In
	addition, as of the end of each calendar year in which the ROTCE for such calendar year
	exceeds 5%, the Sub-Accounts shall also be credited with an additional amount determined
	by multiplying the Participant&#146;s Sub-Account balances during each month of such calendar
	year by the excess of the ROTCE rate over 5%, compounded monthly.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="2%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<U>
	(ii)
</U>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<U>
	Special Rules
</U>
	. In the event that, prior to an applicable Maturity Date,
	a Participant (1)&nbsp;incurs a Termination of Employment or (2)&nbsp;becomes eligible for a
	payment from a Sub-Account hereunder, the foregoing interest calculations shall be made
	as of the last day of the month prior to such date. When making such calculations, the
	ROTCE rate shall be equal to the year-to-date ROTCE rate as of the last day of the prior
	month.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="2%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<U>
	(iii)
</U>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<U>
	Changes
</U>
	. The Committee may change (or suspend) the interest rate
	credited on Accounts at any time. Notwithstanding the foregoing, no such change may be
	made in a manner that would cause an amount to be paid to a Participant who is a Covered
	Employee to be includable as &#147;applicable employee remuneration&#148; of such Participant, as
	such term is defined in Code Section&nbsp;162(m)
<B>
	.&#148;
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<!-- FOLIO -->
	1
<!-- /FOLIO -->
</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P>
<A NAME="eolPage162"></A>
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</H5>
<P>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;4
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The first sentence of Section&nbsp;10(c)(ii) of the Plan is hereby amended by replacing the
	parenthetical phrase &#147;(in accordance with the rules specified in Section 10(b) but at the Fixed
	Income Fund rate)&#148; with &#147;(in accordance with the rules specified in Section 10(b) but at the rate
	of 5%)&#148; therein.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;EXECUTED this 10
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	day of November, 2009.
</DIV>
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>

</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT">

<TD VALIGN="TOP">

</TD>

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage163"></A>
<A NAME="L38668EXV10W88_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_8"></A>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT">
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;10.88
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 2
<BR>
	TO THE
<BR>
	NACCO MATERIALS HANDLING GROUP, INC.
<BR>
	LONG-TERM INCENTIVE COMPENSATION PLAN
<BR>
	FOR THE PERIOD FROM JANUARY 1, 2000 THROUGH DECEMBER 31, 2007
<BR>
	(AS AMENDED AND RESTATED AS OF DECEMBER 1, 2007)
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NACCO Materials Handling Group, Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;), hereby adopts this Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to
	the NACCO Materials Handling Group, Inc. Long-Term Incentive Compensation Plan For the Period From
	January&nbsp;1, 2000 through December&nbsp;31, 2007 (As Amended and Restated as of December&nbsp;1, 2007) (the
	&#147;Plan&#148;), effective January&nbsp;1, 2010. Words and phrases used herein with initial capital letters
	that are defined in the Plan are used herein as so defined.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;4(l) of the Plan is hereby deleted in its entirety without renumbering the remaining
	Subsections of Section&nbsp;4 of the Plan.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;2
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;4(w) of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;(w) &#147;ROTCE&#148; shall mean the return on total capital employed of the Company, as determined
	for a particular Plan Year.&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;10(b) of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;(b)
<U>
	Interest
</U>
	.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;The 2006, 2007 and 2008 Sub-Accounts of the Non-Frozen Participants shall be credited
	with interest in accordance with the rules described in this Subsection; provided, however, that
	(1)&nbsp;no interest shall be credited to the Sub-Accounts of the Frozen Participants, (2)&nbsp;no interest
	shall be credited to the Pre-2006 Sub-Accounts of the Non-Frozen Participants; (3)&nbsp;no interest
	shall be credited to a Sub-Account after the Maturity Date of the Sub-Account, (4)&nbsp;no interest
	shall be credited to a Sub-Account following a Participant&#146;s Termination of Employment prior to a
	Maturity Date (except as described in Section&nbsp;10(c)(ii) with respect to delayed payments made to
	Key Employees on account of a Termination of Employment), (5)&nbsp;no interest shall be credited to the
	Sub-Accounts after the last day of the month preceding the payment date of such Sub-Account and (6)
	no interest in excess of 14% shall be credited to any Sub-Account.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;Subject to the limitations described in clause (i), at the end of each calendar month
	during a calendar year, the applicable Sub-Accounts shall be credited with an amount determined by
	multiplying the Sub-Account balances during such month by 5%. In addition, as of the end of each
	calendar year in which ROTCE for such year exceeds 5%, the Sub-Accounts shall also be credited with
	an additional amount (f any) determined by multiplying the Sub-Account balances during each month
	of such calendar year by the excess of the ROTCE rate over 5%, compounded monthly. In the event
	that, prior to an Applicable Maturity Date, a Non-Frozen Participant (1)&nbsp;incurs a Termination of
	Employment or (2)&nbsp;becomes eligible for a payment from a Sub-Account hereunder, the foregoing
	interest calculations shall be made as of the last day of the month prior to such date and shall be
	based on the year-to-date ROTCE rate as of the last day of the prior month (as calculated by the
	Company).
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iii)&nbsp;The Committee may change (or suspend) the interest rate credited on Accounts at any
	time.&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;4
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The first sentence of Section&nbsp;10(c)(ii) of the Plan is hereby amended by replacing the
	parenthetical phrase &#147;(at the Fixed Income Fund rate)&#148; with &#147;(at the rate of 5%)&#148; therein.
</DIV>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<!-- FOLIO -->
	1
<!-- /FOLIO -->
</DIV>

<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">

</SUP>

<A NAME="eolPage165"></A>
<A NAME="L38668EXV10W117_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_9"></A>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT">
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;10.117
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 2
<BR>
	TO THE
<BR>
	HAMILTON BEACH BRANDS, INC.
<BR>
	LONG-TERM INCENTIVE COMPENSATION PLAN
<BR>
	FOR THE PERIOD FROM JANUARY 1, 2003 THROUGH DECEMBER 31, 2007
<BR>
	(AS AMENDED AND RESTATED EFFECTIVE AS OF DECEMBER 1, 2007)
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hamilton Beach Brands, Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;), hereby adopts this Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to the
	Hamilton Beach Brands, Inc. Long-Term Incentive Compensation Plan For the Period From January&nbsp;1,
	2000 through December&nbsp;31, 2007 (As Amended and Restated Effective as of December&nbsp;1, 2007) (the
	&#147;Plan&#148;), effective January&nbsp;1, 2010. Words and phrases used herein with initial capital letters
	that are defined in the Plan are used herein as so defined.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;4(m) of the Plan is hereby deleted in its entirety without renumbering the remaining
	Subsections of Section&nbsp;4 of the Plan.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;2
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;4(w) of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;(w) &#147;ROTCE&#148; shall mean the consolidated return on total capital employed of NACCO
	Industries, Inc. (&#147;NACCO&#148;), as determined by NACCO for a particular Plan Year.&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;10(b) of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;(b)
<U>
	Interest
</U>
	.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;The Non-Frozen Participant&#146;s Sub-Accounts shall be credited with interest in accordance
	with the rules described in this Subsection; provided, however, that (1)&nbsp;no interest shall be
	credited to the Sub-Accounts of the Frozen Participants, (2)&nbsp;no interest shall be credited to the
	2004 or 2005 Sub-Accounts of the Non-Frozen Participants who are not Covered Employees, (3)&nbsp;no
	interest shall be credited to a Sub-Account after the Maturity Date of the Sub-Account, (4)&nbsp;no
	interest shall be credited to a Sub-Account following a Participant&#146;s Termination of Employment
	prior to a Maturity Date (except as described in Section&nbsp;10(c)(ii) with respect to delayed payments
	made to Key Employees on account of a Termination of Employment), (5)&nbsp;no interest shall be credited
	to the Sub-Accounts after the last day of the month preceding the payment date of such Sub-Account
	and (6)&nbsp;no interest in excess of 14% shall be credited to any Sub-Account.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;Subject to the limitations described in clause (i), at the end of each month during a
	calendar year, the applicable Sub-Accounts shall be credited with an amount determined by
	multiplying the average Sub-Account balances during such month by 5%. In addition, as of the end
	of each calendar year in which the ROTCE for such year exceeds 5%, the Sub-Accounts shall also be
	credited with an additional amount (if any) determined by multiplying the average Sub-Account
	balances during each month of such calendar year by the excess of the ROTCE rate over 5% for such
	calendar year, compounded monthly. In the event that, prior to an applicable Maturity Date, a
	Non-Frozen Participant (1)&nbsp;incurs a Termination of Employment or (2)&nbsp;becomes eligible for a payment
	from a Sub-Account hereunder, the foregoing interest calculations shall be made as of the last day
	of the month prior to such date and shall be based on the year-to-date ROTCE rate as of the last
	day of the prior month (as calculated by NACCO).
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iii)&nbsp;The Committee may change (or suspend) the interest rate credited on Accounts at any
	time.&#148;
</DIV>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<!-- FOLIO -->
	1
<!-- /FOLIO -->
</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P>
<A NAME="eolPage166"></A>
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</H5>
<P>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;4
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The first sentence of Section&nbsp;10(c)(ii) of the Plan is hereby amended by replacing the
	parenthetical phrase &#147;(at the Fixed Income Fund rate)&#148; with the phrase &#147;(at the rate of 5%&#148;)
	therein.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;EXECUTED this 10
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	day of November, 2009.
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage167"></A>
<A NAME="L38668EXV10W118_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_10"></A>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT">
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;10.118
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 2
<BR>
	TO THE HAMILTON BEACH BRANDS, INC.
<BR>
	UNFUNDED BENEFIT PLAN
<BR>
	(
</B>
<U>
<B>
	As Amended and Restated Effective as of December&nbsp;1, 2007
</B>
</U>
<B>
	)
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hamilton Beach Brands, Inc. hereby adopts this Amendment No.&nbsp;2 to the Hamilton Beach Brands,
	Inc. Unfunded Benefit Plan (As Amended and Restated Effective as of December&nbsp;1, 2007) (the &#147;Plan&#148;),
	effective January&nbsp;1, 2010. Words used herein with initial capital letters which are defined in the
	Plan are used herein as so defined.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;2.12 of the Plan is hereby deleted in its entirety without renumbering the remaining
	provisions of Article&nbsp;II.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;2
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;2.21 of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.21
</U>
	ROTCE shall mean the consolidated return on total capital employed of
	NACCO Industries, Inc. (&#147;NACCO&#148;) as determined by NACCO for a particular Plan Year.&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Sections&nbsp;2.22 and 2.23 of the Plan are each hereby deleted in their entirety without
	renumbering the remaining provisions of Article&nbsp;II.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;4
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;4.2(c) of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	&#147;(c) Other Sub-Accounts of Covered Employees
</U>
	. Except as otherwise described in the
	Plan, for periods on and after January&nbsp;1, 2010, at the end of each calendar month during a Plan
	Year, all Sub-Accounts of the Covered Employees shall be credited with an amount determined by
	multiplying such Covered Employee&#146;s average Sub-Account balance during such month by 5%.
	Notwithstanding the foregoing:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	(i)&nbsp;no earnings shall be credited for the month in which the Covered Employee receives the
	distribution of the principle amount of his Sub-Accounts.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	(ii)&nbsp;In the event that the ROTCE determined for such Plan Year exceeds 5%, the Excess Profit
	Sharing Sub-Account, Basic Excess 401(k) Sub-Account and Excess Matching Sub-Account shall each
	retroactively be credited with an additional amount (if any) determined by multiplying the
	Participant&#146;s average Sub-Account balance during each month of such Plan Year by the ROTCE rate
	over 5% for such Plan Year, compounded monthly. This ROTCE calculation shall be made during the
	month in which a Covered Employee incurs a Termination of Employment and shall be based on the
	year-to-date ROTCE for the month ending prior to the date the Participant incurred a Termination of
	Employment, as calculated by NACCO. For any subsequent month following such Termination, such
	ROTCE calculation shall not apply.&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	EXECUTED this 10
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	day of November, 2009.
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage168"></A>
<A NAME="L38668EXV10W119_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_11"></A>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT">
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;10.119
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<B>
	AMENDMENT NO. 1
<BR>
	TO THE
<BR>
	HAMILTON BEACH BRANDS, INC.
<BR>
	LONG-TERM INCENTIVE COMPENSATION PLAN
<BR>
	(EFFECTIVE JANUARY 1, 2008)
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hamilton Beach Brands, Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;), hereby adopts this Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to the
	Hamilton Beach Brands, Inc. Long-Term Incentive Compensation Plan (Effective January&nbsp;1, 2008) (the
	&#147;Plan&#148;), effective January&nbsp;1, 2010. Words and phrases used herein with initial capital letters
	that are defined in the Plan are used herein as so defined.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;1
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;4(j) of the Plan is hereby deleted in its entirety without renumbering the remaining
	Subsections of Section&nbsp;4 of the Plan.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;2
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;4(s) of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;(s) &#147;ROTCE&#148; shall mean the consolidated return on total capital employed of NACCO
	Industries, Inc. (&#147;NACCO&#148;), as determined by NACCO for a particular Plan Year.&#148;
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;3
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;10(b) of the Plan is hereby amended in its entirety to read as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;(b)
<U>
	Interest
</U>
	. The Participant&#146;s Sub-Accounts shall be credited with interest as
	follows; provided, however, that (1)&nbsp;no interest shall be credited to a Sub-Account after the
	Maturity Date of the Sub-Account, (2)&nbsp;no interest shall be credited to a Sub-Account following a
	Participant&#146;s Termination of Employment prior to a Maturity Date (except as described in Section
	10(c)(ii) with respect to delayed payments made to Key Employees on account of a Termination of
	Employment), (3)&nbsp;no interest shall be credited to a Sub-Account after the last day of the month
	preceding the payment date of such Sub-Account and (4)&nbsp;no interest in excess of 14% shall be
	credited to any Sub-Account.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="2%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<U>
	(i)
</U>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<U>
	Interest Rate
</U>
	. At the end of each month during a calendar year, the
	Sub-Accounts of Participants shall be credited with an amount determined by multiplying
	such Participant&#146;s average Sub-Account balances during such month by 5%. In addition,
	as of the end of each calendar year in which the ROTCE for such year exceeds 5%, the
	Sub-Accounts shall be retroactively credited with an additional amount determined by
	multiplying the Participant&#146;s average Sub-Account balances during each month of such
	calendar year by the excess of the ROTCE rate over 5%, compounded monthly.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="2%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<U>
	(ii)
</U>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<U>
	Special Rules
</U>
	. In the event that, prior to an applicable Maturity Date,
	a Participant (1)&nbsp;incurs a Termination of Employment or (2)&nbsp;becomes eligible for a
	payment from a Sub-Account hereunder, the foregoing interest calculations shall be made
	as of the last day of the month immediately preceding such date. When making such
	calculations, the ROTCE rate shall be equal to the year-to-date ROTCE as of the last day
	of the prior month (as calculated by NACCO).
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="2%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<U>
	(iii)
</U>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<U>
	Changes
</U>
	. The Committee may change (or suspend) the interest rate
	credited on Accounts hereunder at any time. Notwithstanding the foregoing, no such
	change may be made in a manner that would cause an amount to be paid to a Participant
	who is a Covered Employee to be includable as &#147;applicable employee remuneration&#148; of such
	Participant, as such term is defined in Code Section&nbsp;162(m).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	Section&nbsp;4
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The first sentence of Section&nbsp;10(c)(ii) of the Plan is hereby amended by replacing the
	parenthetical phrase &#147;(at the Fixed Income Fund rate)&#148; with the phrase &#147;(at the rate of 5%&#148;)
	therein.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;EXECUTED this 10
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	day of November, 2009.
</DIV>
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="48%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="35%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="15%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>

	&nbsp;
</TD>

<B>
	HAMILTON BEACH BRANDS, INC.
</B>
<BR>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
	By:&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>

	Except as noted, all of these subsidiaries are wholly owned, directly or indirectly.

	Industries, Inc. and Subsidiaries, and the effectiveness of internal control over financial
	reporting of NACCO Industries, Inc. and Subsidiaries, and of our report dated March&nbsp;2, 2010, with
	respect to the Combined Financial Statements of The Unconsolidated Mines, included in this Annual
	Report (Form 10-K) for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2009.

<EFX_EXHIBIT_24>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_24"></A>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT">
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;24.1
</B>
</DIV>
<EFX_POWER_OF_ATTORNEY>
<A NAME="FIS_POWER_OF_ATTORNEY"></A>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<U>
<B>
	POWER OF ATTORNEY
</B>
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	KNOW ALL MEN BY THESE PRESENTS, that the undersigned Director of NACCO Industries, Inc. hereby
	constitutes and appoints Charles A. Bittenbender, Kenneth C. Schilling and Suzanne S. Taylor, and
	each of them, as the true and lawful attorney or attorneys-in-fact, with full power of substitution
	and revocation, for the undersigned and in the name, place and stead of the undersigned, to sign on
	behalf of the undersigned as Director of NACCO Industries, Inc., a Delaware corporation, an Annual
	Report pursuant to Section&nbsp;13 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 on Form 10-K for the fiscal
	year ended December&nbsp;31, 2009, and to sign any and all amendments to such Annual Report, and to file
	the same, with all exhibits thereto, and other documents in connection therewith, with the
	Securities and Exchange Commission, granting to said attorney or attorneys-in-fact, and each of
	them, full power and authority to do so and perform each and every act and thing requisite and
	necessary to be done in and about the premises, as fully to all intents and purposes as the
	undersigned might or could do in person, hereby ratifying and confirming all that said attorney or
	attorneys-in-fact or any of them or their substitute or substitutes, may lawfully do or cause to be
	done by virtue hereof.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER">

	the same, with all exhibits thereto, and other documents in connection therewith, with the
	Securities and Exchange Commission, granting to said attorney or attorneys-in-fact, and each of
	them, full power and authority to do so and perform each and every act and thing requisite and
	necessary to be done in and about the premises, as fully to all intents and purposes as the
	undersigned might or could do in person, hereby ratifying and confirming all that said attorney or
	attorneys-in-fact or any of them or their substitute or substitutes, may lawfully do or cause to be
	done by virtue hereof.

<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31"></A>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT">
<B>
	Exhibit&nbsp;31(i)(1)
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<B>
	Certifications
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	I, Alfred M. Rankin, Jr., certify that:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="2%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	I have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of NACCO Industries, Inc.;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="2%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	2.
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a
	material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made,
	in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading
	with respect to the period covered by this report;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="2%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	3.
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial
	information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the
	financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and
	for, the periods presented in this report;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="2%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	4.
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	The registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for
	establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange
	Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as
	defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	a)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such
	disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to
	ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its
	consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities,
	particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or
	caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our
	supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of
	financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external
	purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	c)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#146;s disclosure
	controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the
	effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the
	period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	d)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#146;s internal
	control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#146;s most
	recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#146;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an
	annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to
	materially affect, the registrant&#146;s internal control over financial reporting;
	and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;
</TD>

	5.
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	The registrant&#146;s other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our
	most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the
	registrant&#146;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#146;s board of directors
	(or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	a)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the
	design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are
	reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#146;s ability to record,
	process, summarize and report financial information; and
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or
	other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#146;s internal control
	over financial reporting.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<B>
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350, AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION 906 OF THE
<BR>
	SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 2%">
	In connection with the Annual Report of NACCO Industries, Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;) on Form 10-K
	for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2009, as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission
	on the date hereof (the &#147;Report&#148;), each of the undersigned officers of the Company
	certifies, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &#167; 1350, as adopted pursuant to &#167; 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley
	Act of 2002, that, to such officer&#146;s knowledge:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	The Report fully complies with the requirements of Section
	13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all
	material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the
	Company as of the dates and for the periods expressed in the Report.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P>
<A NAME="eolPage185"></A>
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</H5>
<P>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
	Report of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	The Board of Directors and Shareholders of NACCO Industries, Inc.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	We have audited the accompanying combined balance sheets of The Unconsolidated Mines of The North
	American Coal Corporation as of December&nbsp;31, 2009 and 2008, and the related combined statements of
	net income and comprehensive income, equity, and cash flows for each of the three years in the
	period ended December&nbsp;31, 2009. These combined financial statements are the responsibility of the
	Company&#146;s management. Our responsibility is to express an opinion on these financial statements
	based on our audits.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	We conducted our audits in accordance with the standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight
	Board (United States). Those standards require that we plan and perform the audit to obtain
	reasonable assurance about whether the financial statements are free of material misstatement. We
	were not engaged to perform an audit of the Company&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.
	Our audits included consideration of internal control over financial reporting as a basis for
	designing audit procedures that are appropriate in the circumstances, but not for the purpose of
	expressing an opinion on the effectiveness of the Company&#146;s internal control over financial
	reporting. Accordingly, we express no such opinion. An audit also includes examining, on a test
	basis, evidence supporting the amounts and disclosures in the financial statements, assessing the
	accounting principles used and significant estimates made by management, and evaluating the overall
	financial statement presentation. We believe that our audits provide a reasonable basis for our
	opinion.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	In our opinion, the financial statements referred to above present fairly, in all material
	respects, the combined financial position of The Unconsolidated Mines of The North American Coal
	Corporation at December&nbsp;31, 2009 and 2008, and the combined results of their operations and their
	cash flows for each of the three years in the period ended December&nbsp;31, 2009 in conformity with
	U.S. generally accepted accounting principles.
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
	As explained in Note 2 to the consolidated financial statements, during 2008, the Company adopted
	Statement of Financial Accounting Standards No.&nbsp;158,
<I>
	Employers&#146; Accounting for Defined Benefit
	Pension and Other Postretirement Plans
</I>
	(Codified in FASB ASC 715,
<I>
	Compensation &#150; Retirement
	Benefits).
</I>
</DIV>
